mapper.sql: id, bank_card AS bankCard, transaction_amount AS transactionAmount, transaction_type AS transactionType, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, description
mapper.insert: insert into tb_transaction_record( card_no, transaction_amount, transaction_type, create_time, update_time, description )value( #{cardNo}, #{transactionAmount}, #{transactionType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{description} )
